ygData.subject: Re: Bard quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I have inside sources that say she may have been taken off the server for a little moment to fix a bug with the vendor.  This was evident because I heard that
ygData.messageBody:
I have inside sources that say she may have been taken off the server for
a little moment to fix a bug with the vendor. This was evident because I
heard that people who can track her often see her name as !Genni which
signifies a broken NPC.

Treilanin Loreweaver
Honour Guard, Karana

On Fri, 15 Oct 1999, John Robertson wrote:

> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>
>
>
> Ryan Honeyman wrote:
> >
> > From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
> >
> > >Genni is definately in the temple, I don't remember the
> > >location, but I was able to deal with him. He's in a seperate
> > >location from the bards.
> >
> > SHE is on the third floor next to Ostorm. She sometimes
> > roams around tho. Has anyone else noticed that the keepers
> > change race/sex fairly often? Freaky. Maybe they just
> > rotate around the Temple. Genni definitely stays female
> > erudite. =)
> >
>
> Hmmm. I've spent about 2 hours looking for Genni, both times with other
> bards there as well, and none of us found Genni on Karana.
>
> Apparently, she CAN be tracked, but nobody has found her through
> tracking either.
>
> She wasn't near Ostorm either.
>
> Maybe I'm just really dumb, but more likely she's stuck in a wall or
> something on Karana. Hrm.
>
> Jyzan
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with the subject lol.
>
